Very blurry, there's a section about 20min long that's just black screen with sound, looks like they changed seats and then attempts to adjust the zoom.  The refresh rate is bad, there's a flutter throughout the entire movie.  Give it a week and there will be a better copy on TPB.

AND ON AND ON WE GO! ETC
This has 8 minutes where the video goes blank but there is audio, from 00:50:00 upto 00:58:00.
If you want to simply click to open image links, you need to forbid your browser from sending referer header, that is how imagewshack can tell that you are coming from tpb

@people complaining about blocked links with referrer data

either
a) set your browser never to send referrer data
OR 

b)browse tpb on HTTPS that way any regular outgoing http links don't get sent any referrer data when you click on them (if your browser is not a dumb one, that is)

To everyone complaining about the quality, shut the fuck up. Seriously. It takes like 4 to 5 months TOPS for a movie to come out on DVD nowadays. Why don't you just be patient and wait for DVD or BR rips? Or even better, pay the 8 or 9 dollars to see it in the fucking theater. Complaining about the quality of a cam is like complaining about the smell of a fart. You're just bitching about something that everyone knows is gonna be bad. You should be grateful that anyone even took the time to upload this stuff to you lot of ungrateful twats.
